languages.text: "Лорд-капитан Парсимус Девейн, один из первопроходцев Простора Коронус и основатель сей станции! Мне довелось читать о его подвигах. Господин Девейн некогда был полковником {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Астра Милитарум{/g}, однако волей Его унаследовал {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патент{/g}. Он сумел накопить достаточно сил, чтобы собрать небольшой флот из верных соратников и отправиться покорять Простор Коронус".

traits.locale_text: "Парсимус Девейн, один из важнейших первопроходцев Коронуса и основатель сей станции! Мне довелось читать о его подвигах — господин Девейн некогда был полковником Астра Милитарум, однако сумел накопить достаточно сил, чтобы собрать небольшой флот из верных соратников и отправиться покорять Простор Коронус".

languages.text: "Lord Captain Parsimus Dewain, one of the trailblazers of the Koronus Expanse and this station's founder! I've read about his great deeds. Lord Dewain was once a colonel of the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}, but, by His will, later inherited a {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}. He accumulated enough power to gather a small fleet of loyal allies and venture out to conquer the Koronus Expanse."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан Парсимус Девейн, один из первопроходцев Простора Коронус и основатель сей станции! Мне довелось читать о его подвигах. Господин Девейн некогда был полковником {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Астра Милитарум{/g}, однако волей Его унаследовал {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патент{/g}. Он сумел накопить достаточно сил, чтобы собрать небольшой флот из верных соратников и отправиться покорять Простор Коронус".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain Parsimus Dewain, one of the trailblazers of the Koronus and this station's founder! I've read about his great deeds. Lord Dewain had once been a colonel of the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}, but, by His will, later inherited a {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}. He accumulated enough power to gather a small fleet of loyal allies and venture out to conquer the Koronus Expanse."

Lord Dewain was once a colonel of the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}, but, by His will, later inherited a {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}. He accumulated enough power to gather a small fleet of loyal allies and venture out to conquer the Koronus Expanse."

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテンのパルシムス・ドウェイン、コロヌス・エクスパンスの開拓者の一人でこのステーションの創設者！彼の偉業について読んだことがあります。ドウェイン卿は{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}帝国防衛軍{/g}の大佐でしたが、皇帝のご意志で{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}を継承しました。彼は忠実な仲間を乗せた小規模な艦隊を編制し、コロヌス・エクスパンスを征服する旅に出るために十分な力を蓄えました」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain Parsimus Dewain, one of the trailblazers of the Koronus Expanse and this station's founder! I've read about his great deeds. Lord Dewain was once a colonel of the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}, but, by His will, later inherited a {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}. He accumulated enough power to gather a small fleet of loyal allies and venture out to conquer the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテンのパルシムス・ドウェイン、コロヌス・エクスパンスの開拓者の一人でこのステーションの創設者！彼の偉業について読んだことがあります。ドウェイン卿は{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}帝国防衛軍{/g}の大佐でしたが、皇帝のご意志で{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}を継承しました。彼は忠実な仲間を乗せた小規模な艦隊を編制し、コロヌス・エクスパンスを征服する旅に出るために十分な力を蓄えました」

languages.text: “帕西姆斯·德维恩领主舰长是科罗努斯扩区的先驱者之一，也是这座星站的创始人！我读过他的伟大事迹。德维恩领主曾经是{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}星界军{/g}的上校，但他遵从帝皇的意志，继承了{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}贸易授状{/g}。积累了足够的力量之后，他召集了一支由忠诚盟友组成的小型舰队，踏上了科罗努斯扩区的征服之旅。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain Parsimus Dewain, one of the trailblazers of the Koronus Expanse and this station's founder! I've read about his great deeds. Lord Dewain was once a colonel of the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}, but, by His will, later inherited a {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}. He accumulated enough power to gather a small fleet of loyal allies and venture out to conquer the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: “帕西姆斯·德维恩领主舰长是科罗努斯扩区的先驱者之一，也是这座星站的创始人！我读过他的伟大事迹。德维恩领主曾经是{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}星界军{/g}的上校，但他遵从帝皇的意志，继承了{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}贸易许可证{/g}。积累了足够的力量之后，他召集了一支由忠诚盟友组成的小型舰队，踏上了科罗努斯扩区的征服之旅。”

languages.text: «¡El Lord Capitán Parsimus Dewain, uno de los pioneros de la Extensión de Koronus y el fundador de la estación! He leído mucho sobre sus hazañas. Lord Dewain fue coronel del {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}, pero el Emperador quiso que heredara una {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g}. Acumuló suficiente poder como para reunir una flota de fieles aliados y aventurarse a conquistar la Extensión de Koronus».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain Parsimus Dewain, one of the trailblazers of the Koronus Expanse and this station's founder! I've read about his great deeds. Lord Dewain was once a colonel of the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}, but, by His will, later inherited a {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}. He accumulated enough power to gather a small fleet of loyal allies and venture out to conquer the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: «¡El Lord Capitán Parsimus Dewain, uno de los pioneros de la Extensión de Koronus y el fundador de la estación! He leído mucho sobre sus hazañas. Lord Dewain fue coronel del {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}, pero el Emperador quiso que heredara una {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g}. Acumuló suficiente poder como para reunir una flota de fieles aliados y aventurarse a conquistar la Extensión de Koronus».

languages.text: « Le seigneur-capitaine Parsimus Dewain, l'un des pionniers des Étendues de Koronus et le fondateur de cette station ! J'ai lu des récits de ses exploits. Le seigneur Dewain était autrefois un colonel de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}, mais par la volonté de l'Empereur, il a plus tard hérité d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g}. Il a ensuite accumulé suffisamment d'influence pour former autour de lui une petite flotte d'alliés et partir à la conquête des Étendues de Koronus. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain Parsimus Dewain, one of the trailblazers of the Koronus Expanse and this station's founder! I've read about his great deeds. Lord Dewain was once a colonel of the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}, but, by His will, later inherited a {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}. He accumulated enough power to gather a small fleet of loyal allies and venture out to conquer the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: « Le seigneur-capitaine Parsimus Dewain, l'un des pionniers des Étendues de Koronus et le fondateur de cette station ! J'ai lu des récits de ses exploits. Le seigneur Dewain était autrefois un colonel de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}, mais par la volonté de l'Empereur, il a plus tard hérité d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g}. Il a ensuite accumulé suffisamment d'influence pour former autour de lui une petite flotte d'alliés et partir à la conquête des Étendues de Koronus. »

languages.text: "Lord Captain Parsimus Dewain, einer der Wegbereiter der Koronus-Ausdehnung und der Gründer dieser Station! Ich habe von seinen Großtaten gelesen. Lord Dewain war zunächst Oberst im {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}, erbte aber später gemäß Seines Willens einen {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbrief{/g}. Er wurde mächtig genug, um eine kleine Flotte loyaler Verbündeter um sich zu scharen, und brach auf, die Koronus-Ausdehnung zu erobern."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain Parsimus Dewain, one of the trailblazers of the Koronus Expanse and this station's founder! I've read about his great deeds. Lord Dewain was once a colonel of the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}, but, by His will, later inherited a {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}. He accumulated enough power to gather a small fleet of loyal allies and venture out to conquer the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain Parsimus Dewain, einer der Wegbereiter der Koronus-Ausdehnung und der Gründer dieser Station! Ich habe von seinen Großtaten gelesen. Lord Dewain war zunächst Oberst im {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}, erbte aber später gemäß Seines Willens einen {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbrief{/g}. Er wurde mächtig genug, um eine kleine Flotte loyaler Verbündeter um sich zu scharen, und brach auf, die Koronus-Ausdehnung zu erobern."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan Parsimus Dewain, Koronus Enginliği'nin öncülerinden olup bu istasyonun kurucusudur! Büyük başarılarıyla ilgili çok şey okumuştum. Lord Dewain bir zamanlar {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum'da{/g} albaymış. İmparator'un iradesiyle sonraları bir {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatname'yi{/g} miras almış. Sadık müttefiklerden oluşan küçük bir filo kuracak denli güçlenmiş ve Koronus Enginliği'ni fethetmek üzere sefere çıkmış."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain Parsimus Dewain, one of the trailblazers of the Koronus Expanse and this station's founder! I've read about his great deeds. Lord Dewain was once a colonel of the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}, but, by His will, later inherited a {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}. He accumulated enough power to gather a small fleet of loyal allies and venture out to conquer the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan Parsimus Dewain, Koronus Enginliği'nin öncülerindendir ve bu istasyonun kurucusudur! Onun muazzam başarılarıyla ilgili çok şey okudum. Lord Dewain bir zamanlar {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}'un bir albayıymış ama O'nun iradesiyle daha sonra bir {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatname{/g}'yi miras almış. Sadık müttefiklerden oluşan küçük bir filo kuracak kadar güç elde etmiş ve Koronus Enginliği'ni fethetmek üzere sefere çıkmış."
